about.title: About the Platform
about.subtitle: An innovative platform that combines ease of use and security for exchanging ideas and content
about.description: This platform was developed using the latest technologies to ensure a smooth and secure user experience. It provides users with the ability to create and share their own content, interact with others' content through comments that are reviewed to maintain a positive and safe environment. The platform also fully supports Arabic language with RTL formatting to ensure an optimal user experience for Arabic-speaking users.
